alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 11:12AM CDT until further notice by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Nebraska... South Platte River near Roscoe affecting Keith and Deuel Counties. .Runoff from earlier heavy rainfall in Colorado continues to flow down the South Platte river. The river will rise steadily and go above flood stage Thursday evening. After falling, an additional rise is forecast beginning early Monday morning and is expected to last through the end of the valid forecast. Additional heavy rainfall upstream is occurring and may affect the current crest forecast. For the South Platte River...including Roscoe...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Platte River near Roscoe. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water reaches the gage house floor. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to 9.1 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening to 8.8 feet early Monday morning. It will then rise above flood stage again late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.7 feet on 02/06/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun South Platte River Roscoe 9.0 8.7 Thu 9 am MDT 9.0 9.1 8.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM MDT.
